Rating - Class in com.lpoo.game.AI
01 function alphabeta(node, depth, α, β, maximizingPlayer) 02 if depth = 0 or node is a terminal node 03 return the heuristic value of node 04 if maximizingPlayer 05 v := -∞ 06 for each child of node 07 v := max(v, alphabeta(child, depth – 1, α, β, FALSE)) 08 α := max(α, v) 09 if β ≤ α 10 break (* β cut-off *) 11 return v 12 else 13 v := +∞ 14 for each child of node 15 v := min(v, alphabeta(child, depth – 1, α, β, TRUE)) 16 β := min(β, v) 17 if β ≤ α 18 break (* α cut-off *) 19 return v (* Initial call *) alphabeta(origin, depth, -∞, +∞, TRUE)
